next_steps.note: "Research and select a network scanning tool (e.g., Nmap, Masscan, Zenmap). Document pros/cons of at least 3 options.",
"Define the scope of the network scanning project.  Specifically, identify the target network(s) and permitted scanning activities (e.g., ping sweeps, port scans, OS detection).",
"Set up a test environment for network scanning. This could be a virtual machine or isolated network to avoid unintended consequences.",
"Develop a basic network scan script or configuration utilizing the chosen tool, focusing on a simple ping sweep to verify connectivity.",
"Document a plan for interpreting scan results.  Outline key metrics to focus on (e.g., open ports, live hosts, OS versions) and how to respond to potential findings."
